title: Upword
description: Create summaries faster with Upword's AI tools.

body.raw:
## Product Information

[![Photo by Anita Chong on Unsplash](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/u0v1th4q/production/8b23dd2d5dab8f320cdb7d11deaea4ce9bc4f49f-1200x1200.png)](https://www.upword.ai/)

This tool is verified because it is either an established company or has good social media presence

Added on November 28

*Free trial* *Freemium*

*Browser Extension*
### SocialLinks

[.](I~https://www.instagram.com/upwordofficial/)
[.](t~https://twitter.com/upword_official)
[.](f~https://www.facebook.com/upwordofficial)
[.](m~mailto:support@upword.ai)

---
## Upword Features
Upword is an AI-powered research tool for individuals and teams. Upword is designed to supercharge your entire research workflow: Extract key ideas from content, capture and edit what you need and create summary documents that you can share with your team.


---
## Similar tools

[Browse 61 AI search engine tools](/)

[Browse 116 AI search engine tools](/)

[Browse 40 AI search engine tools ](/)

---

```
Featured on FUTUREPEDIA

```
